channel.title: CVE Feed for WPDeveloper -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WPDeveloper -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-49184|2023-12-15T14:56:35.899Z -- wpdeveloper -- parallax%20slider%20block
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WPDeveloper Parallax Slider Block allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Parallax Slider Block: from n/a through 1.2.4.

item.title: CVE-2023-32245|2023-11-18T22:32:56.251Z -- wpdeveloper -- essential%20addons%20for%20elementor%20pro
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in WPDeveloper Essential Addons for Elementor Pro.This issue affects Essential Addons for Elementor Pro: from n/a through 5.4.8.

item.title: CVE-2023-32243|2023-05-12T07:23:22.657Z -- wpdeveloper -- essential%20addons%20for%20elementor
item.description: Improper Authentication vulnerability in WPDeveloper Essential Addons for Elementor allows Privilege Escalation. This issue affects Essential Addons for Elementor: from 5.4.0 through 5.7.1.

item.title: CVE-2023-32241|2023-08-29T20:11:55.422Z -- wpdeveloper -- essential%20addons%20for%20elementor%20pro
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in WPDeveloper Essential Addons for Elementor Pro plugin <= 5.4.8 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-41955|2024-06-04T17:21:36.211Z -- wpdeveloper -- essential%20addons%20for%20elementor
item.description: Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in WPDeveloper Essential Addons for Elementor allows Privilege Escalation.This issue affects Essential Addons for Elementor: from n/a through 5.8.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-32717|2024-06-04T17:52:02.619Z -- wpdeveloper -- schedulepress
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in WPDeveloper SchedulePress.This issue affects SchedulePress: from n/a through 5.0.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-34764|2024-06-04T17:42:46.504Z -- wpdeveloper -- essential%20addons%20for%20elementor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WPDeveloper Essential Addons for Elementor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Essential Addons for Elementor: from n/a through 5.9.15.

item.title: CVE-2024-30467|2024-06-10T15:09:51.025Z -- wpdeveloper -- essential%20blocks%20for%20gutenberg
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in WPDeveloper Essential Blocks for Gutenberg.This issue affects Essential Blocks for Gutenberg: from n/a through 4.4.9.

item.title: CVE-2024-30226|2024-06-04T17:38:39.520Z -- wpdeveloper -- betterdocs
item.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in WPDeveloper BetterDocs.This issue affects BetterDocs: from n/a through 3.3.3.

item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in WPDeveloper EmbedPress.This issue affects EmbedPress: from n/a through 3.9.11.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WPDeveloper Essential Blocks for Gutenberg allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Essential Blocks for Gutenberg: from n/a through 4.5.3.
